nodes.text: This Duros male was the original owner of the Serendipity. During Han Solo's Cyrkon Extraction, Delia Leighton who now owned the ship, noted that when she worked as a barmaid at a cantina on Lothal, the Duro drank by himself and often told her stories when things in the cantina were quiet. Eventually the Duros died and to Leighton's surprise, he left the Serendipity to her in his will.
